about_the_game:
Step into the dark and chaotic world of Dark Matter's with this free demo.

In the demo, you’ll take on the role of Edgar as he begins his journey to uncover the mysteries surrounding the disappearance of his daughter, Alicia, and the sinister cult lurking in the shadows of Serra do Luar.

Demo Content:

  • Opening Mission: Follow Edgar as he investigates his daughter's disappearance and uncovers the early threads of a cosmic horror tale.

  • Limited Exploration: Access initial areas of Serra do Luar and a small section of the alien dimension controlled by the God of the Void.

  • Puzzles and Stealth Mechanics: Experience the early gameplay challenges with stealth mechanics where monsters rely on sound to detect you.

  • Sanity Management: Get a glimpse of the sanity system, where Edgar's perception warps as his sanity declines.

  • Basic Abilities: Utilize Edgar’s detective instincts to highlight clues and interact with the environment.

This demo offers a taste of Dark Matter's narrative, gameplay mechanics, and oppressive atmosphere, giving you a glimpse of the challenges that await in the full game.

name: Dark Matters Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon Rx 560 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Core i5-10600K / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: An isometric stealth-action adventure blending cosmic horror and mystery. Explore a dark city, face sound-sensitive monsters, solve puzzles, collect crystals to unlock abilities, and manage sanity in a fight to stop the Void God.
